title: Comfort, convenience and unmatched amenities. 1 BR/1 BA, 800 SqFt
posting_body: ['1 - 2 Bedroom  1 - 1.5 Bathroom | 800 - 1150 sq ft | Please call/Month', 'Stratford Arms', '417 Valley Hill Rd SW', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'There is more than just living at Stratford Arms Apartments.', "You've seen the rest, now visit the best, Stratford Arms Apartments.", 'Spacious, affordable, pet friendly apartments for rent in greater Atlanta available now and waiting for you!', "Stratford Arms is managed by knowledgeable and attentive on-site professionals that take pride in exceeding each resident's expectations!", 'Apartment Amenities:', '◾ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '◾ Private Balcony/Patio', '◾', 'Tub/Shower', '◾ Wall to Wall Carpeting', '◾ Washer/Dryer Connections in Townhomes', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '◾ 24 Hour Availability', '◾ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service on Site', '◾ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ Planned Social Activities', '◾ Resident Referral Program', '◾ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '◾ Sundeck', '◾', 'Well Equipped Playground', '◾ Convenient to Hospital & Medical Facilities', '◾ Easy Access to Airport & Interstate Highways', '◾ Free Monthly Pest Control', '◾ Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '◾ Minutes from Southlake Mall & Shopping', '◾ Riverdale Main Library Is Across The Street!', '◾ Tennis Court', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: 12-Month', 'Pets: Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $10.00 Comments: A Pet Agreement is required for all resident pet owners.', 'Allowable pets are dogs, cats, birds and fish.', 'Breed restrictions apply and must be approved by management.', 'Restricted breeds are as follows: Pitbulls/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweilers, Doberman, German Shepherd, Chow, Reptiles, and Pot Bellied Pigs', 'show contact info', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
